ai-patthana16.79:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.79:0.3_0: Since they look forward to enjoying the states of loss, in the breath of the development of the Paths.
ai-patthana16.79:1.1_0: One thing should not be given up by development, nor by development, be given up by development, and by development.
ai-patthana16.79:2.1_0: One thing should not give up repulsion to development, nor doing so by developing the path to no longer give up, there is no cause or condition for development.
ai-patthana16.79:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
